Class RestaurantController

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.controller.RestaurantController
@Controller public class RestaurantController extends Object
RestaurantController ---------------------------- Handles all restaurant-related page requests. Responsibilities: - Displays the Restaurant Manager page for the logged-in owner. - Provides routes for adding, updating, and deleting restaurants. - Ensures all operations are restricted to the current user session.

  • Method Details

    • showRestaurantManager

      @GetMapping("/restaurantmanager") public String showRestaurantManager(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays all restaurants belonging to the currently logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      model - Spring Model used to pass data to the view.
      Returns:
      restaurantmanager.html Thymeleaf view.

    • showRestaurantMenu

      @GetMapping("/restaurantmenu/{id}") public String showRestaurantMenu(@PathVariable("id") int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays a specific restaurant’s menu page for customers.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the restaurant to view.
      model - Spring Model to pass restaurant and menu data to the view.
      Returns:
      restaurantmenu.html Thymeleaf view.

    • showAddRestaurantForm

      @GetMapping("/restaurants/new") public String showAddRestaurantForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the Add New Restaurant form.
      Parameters:
      model - Spring Model used to pass data to the view.
      Returns:
      restaurantnew.html Thymeleaf form.

    • saveRestaurant

      @PostMapping("/restaurants/save") public String saveRestaurant(@ModelAttribute("restaurantModel") RestaurantModel restaurant)
      Handles form submission for creating a new restaurant.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - The RestaurantModel populated from the form.
      Returns:
      Redirects to the Restaurant Manager page on success.

    • showEditRestaurantForm

      @GetMapping("/restaurants/edit/{id}") public String showEditRestaurantForm(@PathVariable("id") int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the Edit Restaurant form for a specific restaurant.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the restaurant to edit.
      model - Spring model used to pass data to the view.
      Returns:
      restaurantedit.html view populated with the restaurant data.

    • updateRestaurant

      @PostMapping("/restaurants/update") public String updateRestaurant(@ModelAttribute("restaurant") RestaurantModel restaurant)
      Handles form submission for updating a restaurant record.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - The RestaurantModel containing updated data.
      Returns:
      Redirects back to the Restaurant Manager page after successful update.

    • deleteRestaurant

      @PostMapping("/restaurants/delete/{id}") public String deleteRestaurant(@PathVariable("id") int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Deletes a restaurant record by its ID.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - The RestaurantModel containing the ID of the restaurant to delete.
      Returns:
      Redirects back to the restaurant manager after deletion.
